file_content.text: Kinda busy right now. I've an appointment with Imperial Command to keep.
Hey--I picked up the snowspeeder explosion on the satellite. Guess you know how to handle yourself after all.
There was never any doubt.
You'll hear no arguments from me.
Anything for the Empire.
Talk to me like that once more, and you'll regret it.
Don't patronize me.
Uh... sorry.
I'm taking the satellite footage over to Imperial Command. I'll be sure to let them know your part in the whole thing.
Hey--shouldn't you be out there blowing up snowspeeders by now?
--Davi? Are you alright? Davi?
My lord! Your timing is perfect. Don't suppose a Sith could help out my operation?
Hey, aren't you that hot shot bounty hunter? It's my lucky, lucky day. You up for a job?
Sir! Perfect timing. Bit of a bind here... think you're up to lending a hand?
Hey--aren't you...? Looks like my lucky day. Listen, I could do with some help here. What do you think?
I am powerful. I can aid you. Should I?
I'm capable of many things.
I think you should, my lord.
What's in it for me?
Depends.
The chance to foil a covert Republic plan to gain control of Hoth. And credits, lots of credits.
It depends on who will benefit from my assistance.
Possibly.
The Empire. Definitely. I've uncovered a covert Republic plan to gain control of Hoth. They must be stopped.
Talk to me like an officer, and I'll think about it.
Show me some respect, first.
Oh--my apologies. Opening my mouth without thinking first is one of my bad qualities.
Identify yourself.
Sarria Jevad, Scout Captain. I sent one of my men to investigate Republic chatter. You won't like what he found.
The Republic is trying to turn a starfighter from a downed freighter into an offensive snowspeeder.
Operates at subzero temps, no icing, tears through blizzards like--well, that thing works and we're scrap. Respectfully.
We can't let them build that ship.
Then they must be stopped.
You're not kidding.
You're exaggerating, surely.
Come on. You know how bad Hoth is. The difficulty moving around, the faulty comm systems.
I don't want to be riding a tauntaun while they're dropping bombs and blasting us from eighty meters.
We need to make that ship our own--use it against the Republic.
Let's seize it for the Empire!
Good idea. In theory. Thing could let us take out a Republic base, fly in reinforcements and have it fully manned before the enemy knew what happened.
It won't work, though.
Their engineers have booby-trapped the snowspeeder against thieves. Our only option is to destroy it.
I'll make sure there's nothing left.
I'll ground it into the snow.
You're right--destroying the ship is better than letting the Republic use it against us.
Seems like the best choice.
Great. You'd better hurry. If they discovered Davi, they'll be moving the ship to a more secure location.
Can't help you. [Refuse quest]
You could have said before I explained everything to you.
Your mother ever tell you it's rude to interrupt people?
